name: Click on the 'Move backward' button and re-read the instructions.
text: I have read and understood the instructions.

choices.name: No
choices.tooltip: Click on the 'Move backward' button to back and re-read the instructions.

text: I have read and understood the content warning.

choices.name: Yes
choices.tooltip: I understand that in rare cases, the texts I will look at may contain false information or emotionally charged, sensational language. If this causes you discomfort or distress, you can end the study at any time.

choices.name: No
choices.tooltip: Click on the 'Move backward' button to back and re-read the Content warning on the first page. If you do not feel comfortable with this task, be sure to return the study.

text: I want to participate in this research and continue with the study.
